title: Tiger Aspect bought by IMG Media | Independent production companies | The Guardian
snippet: Tiger Aspect Productions, one of the UK's most successful and prolific independent television producers has been bought by IMG Media, the owners of Transworld International.

title: Tiger Aspect - Wikipedia
snippet: In June 2006, Tiger Aspect and Tigress Productions were purchased by IMG Media, an international talent and rights group, but were then sold to Endemol UK in November 2009.
